Products. Rho

Image 5 of 5

Rho

0.00
sold out

A practical and elegantly curved countertop basin with ample inner depth.

  • Suitable for surface mounting

  • Designed for use with a wall-mounted tap

  • Compatible with all standard unslotted wastes

  • Taps, trap and waste not included

  • Available in 28 colours

Concrete is a unique material that combines the organic characteristics of natural stone with the ability to be cast into any shape. Read more about concrete characteristics here.

Due to the semi-bespoke nature of our products, all basins are made to order and lead times will vary. An approximate lead time can be given upon enquiry.

Made in the UK and delivered worldwide.
